short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A super minimal blocker of ads, trackers and annoyances which works out of the box

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A super minimal blocker of ads, trackers and annoyances which works out of the box. Compared to most other extensions, it does not require (or offer) any configuration options and "just works".

It's free, safe, and open-sourced!

FAQ: https://github.com/remusao/blockrz#faq
